name: KELLOGG'S* RICE KRISPIES* Caterpillars
author: Anonymous
summary: Use green frosting and licorice laces to create these whimsical caterpillars made with circles of  KELLOGG'S* RICE KRISPIES Treats*. Your kids will love to help make these critters.
directions: In a large microwave safe bowl, heat margarine and marshmallows at HIGH for 3 minutes, stirring after 2 minutes
Stir in KELLOGG'S* RICE KRISPIES* cereal until well coated
Using lightly buttered spatula, press into buttered 3
Make caterpillar sections, using small round cookie cutter, cut cereal into circles
Place eight to nine sections next to each other to form the caterpillar
Decorate with icing to make antennae, eyes, feet, and spots on the caterpillar
